name: 愛依
text: おっ、冬優子ちゃんネイルしてる系～？
trans: Oh, Fuyuko, you do your own nails?

name: 冬優子
text:
うん、プロデューサーさんが来るまで時間もあるし
ちょっとお手入れしておこうかなーって
trans: Yeah, since there's still time before Producer comes, Fuyu thought of doing some manicure while waiting.

name: 愛依
text:
いーじゃん
ちょい、見てもい～い？
trans: Nice~! Mind if I have a look?

name: 冬優子
text:
いいけど、普通だよ？
色も、ただのヌードカラーだし……
trans:
Sure, but it's nothing really special.
Besides, it's just some nude color.

name: 愛依
text:
どんなカンジどんなカンジ～？
おぉっ！
trans:
Lemme see, lemme see~?
Ooh!

name: 愛依
text:
ちょーキレイじゃん！
これ自前？　サロンばりにヤバいんですけど！
trans:
That's so nice!
You did that? That's like salon-level!

name: 冬優子
text:
えへへ、ありがと～
手とか爪をお手入れするの、好きなんだ
trans:
Ehehe, thank you for that compliment.
Fuyu just happens to like taking care of her hands and nails.

name: 愛依
text:
わかる～、うちは友達と見せ合ったりすんの
好きなんだよね～
trans: I know right~! I even like showing it to my friends~.

name: 愛依
text:
あと～、うち最近デザイン変えたんだ～
ほら、見てみ！
trans:
Also, I had my design changed the other day!
Here, have a look!

name: 冬優子
text:
わぁ……！
カラフルで素敵だね♪
trans:
Aah!
It's so colorful and wonderful.

name: 愛依
text:
でしょ～？　ポイントはこのデカいリボン！
めっちゃ盛れたから、友達にも評判良くってさ！
trans:
I know right!? The main star is this big ribbon!
It looks so good that even my friends really dig it!

name: 愛依
text:
あ、そうだ！
冬優子ちゃんも、今度うちみたいにしてみる～？
trans:
I know!
Fuyuko, how about you do like mine next time?

name: 冬優子
text:
え？
愛依ちゃんみたいな……？
trans:
Eh?
Like yours?

name: 愛依
text:
そうそう！
あ、せっかくだし、メイクもうちと合わせようよ！
trans:
Yeah!
Right, while we're at it, have your makeup match mine too!

name: 冬優子
text: メ、メイクも愛依ちゃんみたいに……？
trans: H-Have the makeup match with you too?

name: 愛依
text:
冬優子ちゃんって清純派ー！　って感じじゃん？
ギャルっぽいメイクにしたらマジ迫力出そう！
trans:
You have this pure innocent feel to you, right?
If you put some gyaru-like makeup, you're going to be so intense!

name: 冬優子
text: は、迫力……？
trans: I-Intense?

name: 愛依
text:
いつか、髪とかも弄らせてよ！
ぜーったいみんなにもウケると思うし！
trans:
You better let me do your hair one time!
Pretty sure everyone's gonna fall for you!

name: 冬優子
text:
う、うん！
そう、だね～……
trans:
Y-Yes!
You're right…

name: 愛依
text:
……って、ヤバ！　もうこんな時間じゃん！
うち用事あるから！　じゃね～
trans:
Oh no! It's already this late!
There's something I've got to do! Later!

name: 冬優子
text: うん、お疲れ様～
trans: Okay, be careful on your way!

name: 冬優子
text:
………あんな爪とかメイクなんて、
ウケが悪いに決まってんじゃん
trans: It's obvious that I won't get popular with those nails and makeup.

name: 冬優子
text:
大体、ふゆの手が綺麗なのは当たり前だっての！
どんだけ手入れに気を遣ってると思ってんの？
trans:
Besides, it's obvious that my hands are going to be pretty!
Just how much do you think I spent time taking care of them?

name: 冬優子
text:
（可愛いなんて言いあっても
結局みんな、自分が一番って思ってるくせに……）
trans: (Complimenting others that it's cute yet, deep down, they still think that their own is still the best...)

name: 冬優子
text:
（…………でも、さっきのへらへら笑った顔
そんな裏とかなさそうだったな……）
trans: (But her silly smiling look on her face seem to say that there's no catch in what her saying...)

name: 冬優子
text:
（……ていうか、あんま考えてなさそう
なんか、バカっぽいし……）
trans:
(Or rather, it like no thought has been given to it at all.
Kinda stupid, really.)

name: 冬優子
text:
たまには、ギャルみたいな
ネイルにしてみるのも、悪くないかもね……
trans: I guess it won't hurt if I do my nails into something gyaru-like from time to time.
